snippet: With more parents putting mobile devices into preschoolers’ hands and laps, television networks like Nick Jr. and PBS are turning their focus to educational apps.
abstract: Preschool cable network Nick Jr and PBS are developing educational and promotional apps, attempting to tap new market as more parents put mobile devices into their children's hands.
lead_paragraph: With more parents putting mobile devices into preschoolers’ hands and laps, television networks like Nick Jr. and PBS are turning their focus to educational apps.

headline.seo: Nickelodeon and PBS Pursue Preschool Apps Alongside TV Shows
headline.main: Apps Give Preschoolers a First Look at TV Shows
headline.print_headline: Apps Give Preschoolers A First Look At TV Shows
